trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for collecting layout scheme characteristics.
trans-unit.target: 레이아웃 체계 특징을 수집 하기 위한 기본 클래스를 제공 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The LayoutSettings class is the base class for types that collect the various characteristics common to a specific user interface (UI) layout scheme, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutSettings> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutSettings>.
trans-unit.target: LayoutSettings 클래스는 공통 다양 한 특성 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutSettings>및 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutSettings>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutSettings> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutSettings> 등 특정 사용자 인터페이스 (UI) 레이아웃 체계에 수집 하는 형식에 대 한 기본 클래스

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LayoutSettings"></xref> class.
Gets the current table layout engine.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutSettings.LayoutEngine%2A> property is typically used in two contexts: the container that uses a layout scheme, and the child control of the container to which the layout scheme is applied.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutSettings.LayoutEngine%2A>속성은 일반적으로는 두 가지 컨텍스트 사용: 컨테이너 및를 사용 하는 레이아웃 체계를 레이아웃 구성표가 적용 되는 컨테이너의 자식 컨트롤.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutSettings.LayoutEngine%2A>
